Reviews.Title: astak cctv
Reviews.Author: Sweet D
Reviews.Content: the astak cctv 8 channel video audio real time security surveillance dvr is great.. it was very easy to set up . I love the concept of the usb port infront . Ive had  the dvr for a couple of weeks and it is working great .I would recommend this product to family and friends

Reviews.Title: Astak CCTV 8 Channel Video Audio H.264 Real-time Security Surveillance DVR.
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Nice system but, does not come with disc for hard drive. Can't use most of the options without it and can't find it online. Good for recording only.

ProductInfo.Features:
Efficiently recorded video by time and event list. User-friendly graphical user interface
H.264 video compression. D1/Half D1/CIF resolution. VGA output: 1024x768 resolution
Can be controlled by mouse and IR remote (remote control included).Internet monitoring function
Recording can be triggered manually, by motion or by schedule for real-time or time lapse recording
Multi-operational mode: live viewing, recording, playback, networking and backup can all be performed simultaneously
ProductInfo.Name: Astak CCTV 8 Channel Video Audio H.264 Real-time Security Surveillance DVR system with 500GB Hard Drive, Network and Internet Viewing Monitoring System Support Remote/Mouse (DVR+Four 420 TVL Cameras)
